lessonSubtitleText: Test how well you know this story

questions.text: What did God bless Abram and Lot with?
What problem did Abram and Lot have?
answers: Their shepherds were fighting over space for their animals
They couldn’t find enough food for their families
They forgot which direction God wanted them to go
They both wanted to live in the same tent

questions.text: What was Abram’s idea to solve their problem?
answers: Lot goes one way, Abram goes the other
They should build a giant fence to divide the land
They should take turns using the same fields
They should sell all their animals and start over

questions.text: Where did Abram and Lot go?
answers: Lot went to the Jordan River valley, Abram went to Canaan
Lot went to Egypt, Abram went to Babylon
Lot went to the beach, Abram went to the mountains
They both stayed together and didn’t move

questions.text: God said that Abram's future family would be as uncountable as...?
answers: Dust on the ground and stars in the sky

questions.text: What new name did God give Abram and what did it mean?
What new name did God give Sarai and what did it mean?
What did God promise to do for Sarah?
answers: Give her long life without sickness
Give her great wealth and fame

questions.text: What did Abraham do when God said Sarah would have a son?
answers: He fell to the ground with laughter
He gave God a thumb's up

questions.text: What did God tell Abraham to name his son and what did it mean?
